professional_summary: Self-starter, customer-focused business development professional with extensive experience in HR, recruiting, and staffing industry. Proven track record of exceeding corporate objectives and quotas with strong communication and relationship-building skills. Specializes in business implementation, recruiting, and customer relations.

work_experience.description: Human Resources, Recruiting, and Business Development professional focusing on client services and relationship management
responsibilities: Provide Human Resources, Recruiting, Screening, and staffing services to employers in assigned areas
Maintain and build relationships with new and existing clients
Network through industry contacts and association memberships
Analyze data to identify business development opportunities
